title: 2  Week One
text:
In the first week, this portfolio has content about the basics of remote sensing cities and environment and the presentation learning in Xaringan tool.
##Introduction and Background
NASA launched …. popularly known as remote sensing which is interchangeably called as ‘Earth Observation’. Sensors are mounted on satellites, drones etc. There are 27,000 pieces of junks/ waste satellites lying in space. Google earth search engine reduces the time of image. Policy is required.
##Sensors
The sensors monitor electromagnetic rays of spectrum. They are of two types
###Active Sensors
They are those that emit energy.
###Passive Sensors
They are those that does not emit energy but reflects back energy from sun.
##Electromagnetic Spectrum
A electromagnetic Spectrum is
###Frequency
###Hz
